info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches the latest 10-Q for reading and 10-K financials (Excel) using SEC data. CIK resolution supports aliases via GitHub, is case-insensitive, and avoids redundant mappings. Alias learning updates only valid matches and syncs to GitHub.

get.description: Returns the latest 10-Q HTML and 10-K Excel filing links for a company. Now with smarter fallback matching, alias learning avoids duplicates, and GitHub sync stores only validated aliases.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Public company name, alias, or ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, Apple, Meta, Facebook, RH, NVIDIA).

200.description: Returns matched company name, resolved CIK, most recent 10-Q HTML, and Excel from latest 10-K if available.

Matched Company Name.description: SEC-registered name that best matches the input

CIK.description: Central Index Key used to locate filings

10-Q Filing.description: Most recent 10-Q links or a fallback string if none found

10-K Excel.description: Excel financial download link from the latest 10-K

404.description: No matching company or filings found
